CustomField.formula: If( NokiaCPQ_Is_SI__c, if( AND(!ISNULL(Apttus_Config2__ExtendedQuantity__c),Apttus_Config2__ExtendedQuantity__c!= 0), ((Apttus_Config2__NetPrice__c / Apttus_Config2__ExtendedQuantity__c)*Apttus_Config2__Quantity__c), Apttus_Config2__NetPrice__c ) ,IF( Contains(NokiaCPQ_Configuration_Type__c,'Bundle') && TEXT(Apttus_Config2__LineType__c)='Option', IF( Apttus_Config2__GroupAdjustmentPercent__c != 0.00, ROUND((NokiaCPQ_Extended_CUP__c*(1+Apttus_Config2__GroupAdjustmentPercent__c)),2), NokiaCPQ_Extended_CNP__c ), Apttus_Config2__NetPrice__c))
CustomField.label: Extended CNP After LSD
